dataPackages.name: camtrap-dp

tableSchemas.name: deployments
tableSchemas.title: Camera trap: deployments
tableSchemas.description: Camera trap: deployments schema

tableSchemas.name: media
tableSchemas.title: Camera trap: media
tableSchemas.description: Camera trap: media schema

tableSchemas.name: observations
tableSchemas.title: Camera trap: observations
tableSchemas.description: Camera trap: observations schema

allOf.description: Required schemas must be present: deployments, media, observations

dataPackages.title: Camera Trap Data Package (Camtrap DP)
dataPackages.description: Camera Trap Data Package is a community developed data exchange format for camera trap data.

dataPackages.name: coldp
dataPackages.title: Catalogue of Life Data Package (ColDP)
dataPackages.description: The recommended exchange format for data to and from COL ChecklistBank is a tabular text format with a fixed set of files and columns.

tableSchemas.name: author
tableSchemas.title: Author
tableSchemas.description: Normalised and structured authors that can be referred to by names, references and taxon scrutinizers. All entities also allow to specify a modifedBy field which must reference an Author identifier here.

tableSchemas.name: distribution
tableSchemas.title: Distribution
tableSchemas.description: A structured distribution record for a taxon in a given area.

tableSchemas.name: media
tableSchemas.title: Media
tableSchemas.description: Multimedia items for a taxon such as an image, audio or video.

tableSchemas.name: name-relation
tableSchemas.title: Name Relation
tableSchemas.description: A directed nomenclatural name relation. See #name-relations for examples and definitions.

tableSchemas.name: name-usage
tableSchemas.title: Name Usage
tableSchemas.description: As a simpler alternative to the 3 entities Name, Taxon and Synonym a single NameUsage entity can be supplied. A NameUsage record can either be an accepted Taxon or a Synonym and is easily distinguished by its status. A NameUsage.ID acts both as a taxonID and nameID if referred to from other table, e.g TypeMaterial or VernacularName. For synonyms the parentID field is used to link to the accepted taxon. All properties available in the individual entities can also be used for the single NameUsage:  There are two clashing properties that exist both on a Name and Taxon/Synonym, but which have a slightly different meaning. Therefore the following properties deviate slightly from their usage in their classic version:

tableSchemas.name: name
tableSchemas.title: Name
tableSchemas.description: Names can be shared in a structured way using various fields, but rank, scientificName and authorship alone are sufficient. See for examples and rationales. A structured scientificName can be given using the following fields:

tableSchemas.name: reference
tableSchemas.title: Reference
tableSchemas.description: Structured bibliographic references with a unique id to refer to from other entities. References can be given either as a simple, single citation string, or in a structured form. ColDP supports fully parsed references in CSV based on the CSL-JSON format. Alternatively references can also be provided in the native file formats for the well established BibTex or CSL-JSON formats. See the sections below with for how to share alternative formats that do not conform to tabular CSV/TSV files.

tableSchemas.name: species-estimate
tableSchemas.title: Species Estimate
tableSchemas.description: An estimation of the number of species for a given higher taxon, e.g. a family. The estimation must be based on a reference and should give the number of species according to a certain "type" that is expected to exist.
A directed taxon relation representing species interactions. Different to a TaxonConceptRelation a species interaction can also point to a species (name) outside of the local dataset.
tableSchemas.name: species-interaction
tableSchemas.title: Species Interaction

tableSchemas.name: synonym
tableSchemas.title: Synonym
tableSchemas.description: A synonymous name for a taxon. Note that the same name can be linked to multiple taxa by having several Synonym records to model pro parte synonyms.

tableSchemas.name: taxon-concept-relation
tableSchemas.title: Taxon Concept Relation
tableSchemas.description: A directed taxon relation representing RCC5 taxon concept assertions.

tableSchemas.name: taxon-property
tableSchemas.title: Taxon Property
tableSchemas.description: A flexible, generic way to assign arbitrary property values to a taxon. It can be used to share species profiles, traits, descriptions and any other dynamic information about a taxon. Every property value can optionally be referenced and ordered.

tableSchemas.name: taxon
tableSchemas.title: Taxon
tableSchemas.description: An accepted name with a taxonomic classification given either as a parent-child relation or as a flat, denormalized record.

tableSchemas.name: treatment
tableSchemas.title: Treatment
tableSchemas.description: Treatments are parts of publications that "treat" a single taxon. They can be an original description for a new species, but also subsequent taxonomic works and usually include several sections such as a diagnosis, description, material examined, distribution, etc. ColDP captures an entire treatment either as an TXT, HTML or XML document that lives as an individual file in a subfolder treatments and is named by the corresponding taxonID of the name usage it describes. The taxons accordingToID should always point to the reference the treatment is published in. Example: treatments/19854332.html would be an html document which is the marked up treatment for the taxon with ID 19854332.

tableSchemas.name: type-material
tableSchemas.title: Type Material
tableSchemas.description: Type material designated to names. Type material should only be associated with the original name, not with a recombination.

tableSchemas.name: vernacular-name
tableSchemas.title: Vernacular Name
tableSchemas.description: A vernacular or common name for a taxon.

allOf.description: At least one required schema present: name, taxon, reference, name-usage
If 'name', 'taxon' or 'synonym' present, then 'name-usage' must not be present
If 'name-usage' present, then 'name', 'taxon' and 'synonym' must not be present

dataPackages.name: dwc-dp

tableSchemas.name: agent
tableSchemas.title: Agent
tableSchemas.description: A person, group, organization or other entity that can act.

tableSchemas.name: agent-agent-role
tableSchemas.title: AgentAgentRole
tableSchemas.description: A role filled by an Agent with respect to another Agent.

tableSchemas.name: agent-identifier
tableSchemas.title: AgentIdentifier
tableSchemas.description: An identifier for an Agent.

tableSchemas.name: agent-media
tableSchemas.title: AgentMedia
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing an Agent as content in a Media entity.

tableSchemas.name: chronometric-age
tableSchemas.title: ChronometricAge
tableSchemas.description: An approximation of temporal position (in the sense conveyed by https://www.w3.org/TR/owl-time/#time:TemporalPosition) that is supported by evidence.

tableSchemas.name: chronometric-age-agent-role
tableSchemas.title: ChronometricAgeAgentRole
tableSchemas.description: A role filled by an Agent with respect to a chrono:ChronometricAge.

tableSchemas.name: chronometric-age-assertion
tableSchemas.title: ChronometricAgeAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An Assertion made by an Agent about a chrono:ChronometricAge.

tableSchemas.name: chronometric-age-reference
tableSchemas.title: ChronometricAgeReference
tableSchemas.description: A bibliographic reference in which a chrono:ChronometricAge is mentioned.

tableSchemas.name: chronometric-age-media
tableSchemas.title: ChronometricAgeMedia
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing a chrono:ChronometricAge as content of a Media entity.

tableSchemas.name: chronometric-age-protocol
tableSchemas.title: ChronometricAgeProtocol
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing a Protocol used in the determination of a chrono:ChronometricAge.

tableSchemas.name: collection
tableSchemas.title: Collection
tableSchemas.description: A persistent formal repository in which dwc:MaterialEntities and/or Media are preserved.

tableSchemas.name: collection-agent-role
tableSchemas.title: CollectionAgentRole
tableSchemas.description: A role filled by an Agent with respect to a Collection.

tableSchemas.name: collection-assertion
tableSchemas.title: CollectionAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An Assertion made by an Agent about a Collection.

tableSchemas.name: collection-media
tableSchemas.title: CollectionMedia
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing a Collection as content of a Media entity.

tableSchemas.name: event
tableSchemas.title: Event
tableSchemas.description: An action, process, or set of circumstances occurring at a dcterms:Location during a period of time.

tableSchemas.name: event-agent-role
tableSchemas.title: EventAgentRole
tableSchemas.description: A role filled by an Agent with respect to a dwc:Event.

tableSchemas.name: event-assertion
tableSchemas.title: EventAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An Assertion made by an Agent about a dwc:Event.

tableSchemas.name: event-reference
tableSchemas.title: EventReference
tableSchemas.description: A bibliographic reference in which a dwc:Event is mentioned.

tableSchemas.name: event-identifier
tableSchemas.title: EventIdentifier
tableSchemas.description: An identifier for a dwc:Event.

tableSchemas.name: event-media
tableSchemas.title: EventMedia
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing a dwc:Event as content of a Media entity.

tableSchemas.name: event-protocol
tableSchemas.title: EventProtocol
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing a Protocol used in a dwc:Event.

tableSchemas.name: geological-context
tableSchemas.title: GeologicalContext
tableSchemas.description: A set of geological designations, such as stratigraphy, that qualifies a dwc:Event.

tableSchemas.name: geological-context-media
tableSchemas.title: GeologicalContextMedia
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing a dwc:GeologicalContext as content of a Media entity.

tableSchemas.name: identification
tableSchemas.title: Identification
tableSchemas.description: A taxonomic determination (i.e., the assignment of dwc:Taxa to dwc:Organisms).

tableSchemas.name: identification-agent-role
tableSchemas.title: IdentificationAgentRole
tableSchemas.description: A role filled by an Agent with respect to a dwc:Identification.

tableSchemas.name: identification-taxon
tableSchemas.title: IdentificationTaxon
tableSchemas.description: A construct of components and positions of dwc:scientificNames in a dwc:Identification.

tableSchemas.name: material
tableSchemas.title: Material
tableSchemas.description: An entity that can be identified, exist for some period of time, and consist in whole or in part of physical matter while it exists.

tableSchemas.name: material-agent-role
tableSchemas.title: MaterialAgentRole
tableSchemas.description: A role filled by an Agent with respect to a dwc:MaterialEntity.

tableSchemas.name: material-assertion
tableSchemas.title: MaterialAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An Assertion made by an Agent about a dwc:MaterialEntity.

tableSchemas.name: material-reference
tableSchemas.title: MaterialReference
tableSchemas.description: A bibliographic reference in which a dwc:MaterialEntity is mentioned.

tableSchemas.name: material-identifier
tableSchemas.title: MaterialIdentifier
tableSchemas.description: An identifier for a dwc:MaterialEntity.

tableSchemas.name: material-media
tableSchemas.title: MaterialMedia
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing a dwc:MaterialEntity as content of a Media entity.

tableSchemas.name: material-protocol
tableSchemas.title: MaterialProtocol
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing a Protocol used in the treatment of a dwc:MaterialEntity.

tableSchemas.name: media
tableSchemas.title: Media
tableSchemas.description: A dcmi:MediaType (dcmi:Sounds, dcmi:StillImages, dcmi:MovingImages or dcmi:Text) with other entities as content.

tableSchemas.name: media-agent-role
tableSchemas.title: MediaAgentRole
tableSchemas.description: A role filled by an Agent with respect to a Media entity.

tableSchemas.name: media-assertion
tableSchemas.title: MediaAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An Assertion made by an Agent about a Media entity.

tableSchemas.name: media-identifier
tableSchemas.title: MediaIdentifier
tableSchemas.description: An identifier for a Media entity.

tableSchemas.name: molecular-protocol
tableSchemas.title: MolecularProtocol
tableSchemas.description: A protocol used to derive and identify a nucleotide sequence from a dwc:MaterialEntity.

tableSchemas.name: molecular-protocol-agent-role
tableSchemas.title: MolecularProtocolAgentRole
tableSchemas.description: A role filled by an Agent with respect to a MolecularProtocol.

tableSchemas.name: molecular-protocol-assertion
tableSchemas.title: MolecularProtocolAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An Assertion made by an Agent about a MolecularProtocol.

tableSchemas.name: molecular-protocol-reference
tableSchemas.title: MolecularProtocolReference
tableSchemas.description: A bibliographic reference in which a MolecularProtocol is mentioned.

tableSchemas.name: nucleotide-analysis
tableSchemas.title: NucleotideAnalysis
tableSchemas.description: A link between a NucleotideSequence and a dwc:Event and a dwc:MaterialEntity from which it was derived, using a specified Protocol.

tableSchemas.name: nucleotide-analysis-assertion
tableSchemas.title: NucleotideAnalysisAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An Assertion made by an Agent about a NucleotideAnalysis.

tableSchemas.name: nucleotide-sequence
tableSchemas.title: NucleotideSequence
tableSchemas.description: A digital representation of a nucleotide sequence.

tableSchemas.name: occurrence
tableSchemas.title: Occurrence
tableSchemas.description: A state of a dwc:Organism in a dwc:Event.

tableSchemas.name: occurrence-agent-role
tableSchemas.title: OccurrenceAgentRole
tableSchemas.description: A role filled by an Agent with respect to a dwc:Occurrence.

tableSchemas.name: occurrence-assertion
tableSchemas.title: OccurrenceAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An Assertion made by an Agent about a dwc:Occurrence.

tableSchemas.name: occurrence-reference
tableSchemas.title: OccurrenceReference
tableSchemas.description: A bibliographic reference in which a dwc:Occurrence is mentioned.

tableSchemas.name: occurrence-identifier
tableSchemas.title: OccurrenceIdentifier
tableSchemas.description: An identifier for a dwc:Occurrence.

tableSchemas.name: occurrence-media
tableSchemas.title: OccurrenceMedia
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing a dwc:Occurrence as content of a Media entity.

tableSchemas.name: occurrence-protocol
tableSchemas.title: OccurrenceProtocol
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing a Protocol used in the determination of a dwc:Occurrence.

tableSchemas.name: organism-interaction
tableSchemas.title: OrganismInteraction
tableSchemas.description: An interaction between two dwc:Organisms during a dwc:Event.

tableSchemas.name: organism-interaction-agent-role
tableSchemas.title: OrganismInteractionAgentRole
tableSchemas.description: A role filled by an Agent with respect to an OrganismInteraction.

tableSchemas.name: organism-interaction-assertion
tableSchemas.title: OrganismInteractionAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An Assertion made by an Agent about an OrganismInteraction.

tableSchemas.name: organism-interaction-reference
tableSchemas.title: OrganismInteractionReference
tableSchemas.description: A bibliographic reference in which an OrganismInteraction is mentioned.

tableSchemas.name: organism-interaction-media
tableSchemas.title: OrganismInteractionMedia
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing an OrganismInteraction as content of a Media entity.

tableSchemas.name: phylogenetic-tree
tableSchemas.title: PhylogeneticTree
tableSchemas.description: A branching diagram that shows the evolutionary relationships between dwc:Organisms.

tableSchemas.name: phylogenetic-tree-assertion
tableSchemas.title: PhylogeneticTreeAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An Assertion made by an Agent about a PhylogeneticTree.

tableSchemas.name: phylogenetic-tree-reference
tableSchemas.title: PhylogeneticTreeReference
tableSchemas.description: A bibliographic reference in which a PhylogeneticTree is mentioned.

tableSchemas.name: phylogenetic-tree-identifier
tableSchemas.title: PhylogeneticTreeIdentifier
tableSchemas.description: An identifier for a PhylogeneticTree.

tableSchemas.name: phylogenetic-tree-media
tableSchemas.title: PhylogeneticTreeMedia
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing a PhylogeneticTree as content of a Media entity.

tableSchemas.name: phylogenetic-tree-protocol
tableSchemas.title: PhylogeneticTreeProtocol
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing a Protocol used in the determination of a PhylogeneticTree.

tableSchemas.name: phylogenetic-tree-tip
tableSchemas.title: PhylogeneticTreeTip
tableSchemas.description: A group of Taxa at the end of a branch of a PhylogeneticTree as determined from relationships between dwc:Organisms.

tableSchemas.name: phylogenetic-tree-tip-assertion
tableSchemas.title: PhylogeneticTreeTipAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An Assertion made by an Agent about a PhylogeneticTreeTip.

tableSchemas.name: protocol
tableSchemas.title: Protocol
tableSchemas.description: A method used during an action.

tableSchemas.name: protocol-reference
tableSchemas.title: ProtocolReference
tableSchemas.description: A bibliographic reference in which a Protocol is mentioned.

tableSchemas.name: reference
tableSchemas.title: Reference
tableSchemas.description: A bibliographic reference in which an entity is mentioned.

tableSchemas.name: relationship
tableSchemas.title: Relationship
tableSchemas.description: A specification for a relationship of a subject entity to a related entity.

tableSchemas.name: survey
tableSchemas.title: Survey
tableSchemas.description: A biotic survey.

tableSchemas.name: survey-agent-role
tableSchemas.title: SurveyAgentRole
tableSchemas.description: A role filled by an Agent with respect to a Survey.

tableSchemas.name: survey-assertion
tableSchemas.title: SurveyAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An Assertion made by an Agent about a Survey.

tableSchemas.name: survey-reference
tableSchemas.title: SurveyReference
tableSchemas.description: A bibliographic reference in which a Survey is mentioned.

tableSchemas.name: survey-identifier
tableSchemas.title: SurveyIdentifier
tableSchemas.description: An identifier for a Survey.

tableSchemas.name: survey-protocol
tableSchemas.title: SurveyProtocol
tableSchemas.description: A link establishing a Protocol used in a Survey.

tableSchemas.name: survey-target
tableSchemas.title: SurveyTarget
tableSchemas.description: A specification of a characteristic of dwc:Occurrence that was included or excluded in a Survey.

dataPackages.title: Darwin Core Data Package
dataPackages.description: A data package for sharing biodiversity data using Darwin Core.
